author: Jacob Dressler
description:
A X-Men reboot is one of the next projects slated for the Marvel Cinematic Universe. The long-running film franchise recently acquired rights to the iconic characters, and we’ve finally seen some of Fox’s X-Men heroes appear in the MCU, the new reboot will be a “recognizably different” take on the characters. Jake Schreier was recently [...]

The post ‘X-Men’ Director Teases “Recognizably Different” MCU Reboot appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘X-Men’ Director Teases “Recognizably Different” MCU Reboot

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
Sydney Sweeney recently played a central role in a new marketing campaign from American Eagle. While many Sweeney fans were amused by the campaign, there was ultimately some backlash regarding her involvement, and now American Eagle has issued a statement regarding the Sydney Sweeney controversy. It appears that the controversy began with an advertisement where [...]

The post American Eagle Releases Statement Over Sydney Sweeney Controversy appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: American Eagle Releases Statement Over Sydney Sweeney Controversy

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
The Marvel Cinematic Universe has so far given fans a total of three Spider-Man movies, all of which star Tom Holland as the MCU’s titular Spider-Man. The third installment, Spider-Man: No Way Home, took things to a new level by featuring special appearances from Tobey Maguire and Andrew Garfield as their respective Spider-Men. Now the [...]

title: ‘Spider-Man: Brand New Day’ First Teaser Trailer Released
